name: Appa
info:
• 简体中文名: 阿柏
  • 性别: 雄
  • 生日: 6 BG
  • 引用来源: http://avatar.wikia.com/wiki/Appa
  • 声优: Dee Bradley Baker
detail: Appa was Avatar Aang's loyal sky bison, who shared a strong bond with Aang and with Momo, as they were all some of the few remaining traces of the Air Nomad civilization.[4] Appa was most noted for his ability to fly in spite of his heavy weight, a feat achieved through airbending which made Appa the primary means of transportation utilized by Team Avatar.
